objects.name: Analytic 0703
objects.description: Detect alterations of transmitted data via monitoring syscalls (`send`, `recv`, `write`) or middleware interception. Identify mismatched file hashes when compared at origin vs. destination. Watch for anomalous activity from processes interacting with secure transmission services (e.g., OpenSSL, scp).

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: auditd:SYSCALL
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: send, recv, write: Abnormal interception or alteration of transmitted data

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: linux:syslog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Integrity mismatch warnings or malformed packets detected

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: List of processes authorized to handle transmitted data (e.g., sshd, nginx).
Frequency of out-of-band integrity verification checks.
